```{r}
library(formr)
library(dplyr)
formr_connect(email = "bmuchmore@gmail.com", password = "dogsdogs" )
codebook_data  <- formr_results("testflusurvey") %>%
  select(-session, -created, - modified, -ended) %>%
  select(-expired, -last_outside_referrer, -ip_address, -browser)
```

```{r}
library(codebook) 

codebook_data <- detect_missing(
  codebook_data,
  only_labelled = TRUE,
  negative_values_are_missing = FALSE,
  ninety_nine_problems = TRUE
  )

codebook(codebook_data)

```
